issue.title: [CF 1509] Lua Warning Couldn't open interface\addons\TellMeWhen_Options\ v8.5
issue.body:
I am getting this message every time I click Show Main Options. After that I can not import/export/restore files. 


> Posted by CurseForge user blacksbane | Imported from CurseForge issue #1509 | Raw

comments.body:
Same thing when using command /tmw


> Posted by CurseForge user Alphabot

For me, it only happens the first time entering TMW after entering the game.  However, the error report is the only symptom.  I have zero other issues so far aside from something about UNIT_VEHICLE which I already reported.

 

I'm not meaning to gloat but just saying it's strange that I don't have issues while others do.

Edited Jul 19, 2018

> Posted by CurseForge user Kosouda

Super simple fix, in TellMeWhen_Options.toc, there's a line that is a single space.  Just delete the space. ðŸ™ƒ


> Posted by CurseForge user roncli

Thanks. Strange that only some people are getting this as an error.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
